EmailTemplate.name: Darla's Out Of Office
EmailTemplate.subject: Heads up for Next Week
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good Morning!
Just a heads up that I will be out of the office next week from Wednesday 10/2 through Tuesday 10/8 returning Wednesday, 10/9.
With this in mind, please submit your orders in advance so that I can assist you this week.
Please let me know what I can do for you today so that next week is a productive one for you and your team.
Thank you for being my customer!
Best Regards,
Darla Langdon Account Representative Univar T +1 877-285-0220 D +1 253-872-5080 F +1 425-497-3762 (Please note my new fax number)
All transactions are subject to Univar's Standard Terms & Conditions, available at www.univarusa.com or upon request. Univar rejects all other terms and conditions unless otherwise agreed upon in writing by an authorized Univar representative.
